decision_conditions: Condition 1 of planning permission 20/03123/FUL is amended as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details:04 Proposed Floor Plans and Roof Plans05 Proposed Front and Rear Elevations06 Proposed Section/ElevationReason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Application ref: 20/03123/FUL (Installation of 2 no. conservation style rooflights to pitched roof at rear of property and 1 no. window to flat roof) dated 01/06/2021. Amendment to consist of Installation of 1 additional conservation roof light
